newsitem.title: USA: EDITEK settles suit, issues 7.3 mln shares.
newsitem.headline: EDITEK settles suit, issues 7.3 mln shares.

text.p: EDITEK Inc said Wednesday it had settled a lawsuit by issuing six holders of its Series A convertible preferred shares about 7.3 million common shares.

The lawsuit arose last year when the company ran out of authorized shares of common to effect conversions requested by the preferred shareholders, EDITEK said. Holders of common stock have since voted to authorize additional shares.
Under the settlement, the preferred shareholder plaintiffs received about 15 percent fewer shares than they were demanding in the litigation, said the company.
EDITEK provides diagnostic kits for on-site analysis of drugs of abuse and toxins in agricultural products.
